meaningMnemonic: I want to <kanji>expand</kanji> my business. I want to <kanji>show</kanji> my goods. I want to do this in a place where everyone <kanji>meet</kanji>s up to do these things. You can do this in a <vocabulary>trade show</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
